name: Days of the Bagnold Summer (2019)
description: \n                        An idle summer in the lives of a shy fifteen-year-old heavy metal fan and his librarian mother. Sue, 52, works in a library. Her son Daniel, 15, is still at school. This was the summer holidays Daniel was due to spend with his father and his father's pregnant new wife in Florida. When they cancel his trip, Sue and Daniel face six long weeks together.\n
